sentences: Olen osanud seda tööd varem ka.
Ta on osanud paljusid keeli õppida.
Meie kool oli osanedu parimate seas.
context: The Estonian word 'osanud' is the past participle form of the verb 'osama', which means 'to be able to' or 'to manage'. It indicates that someone has had the ability or skill to do something successfully. This form is commonly used with auxiliary verbs like 'olema' (to be) to express completed actions where ability was involved.
